metadata.title: CVE-2017-17971 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The test_sql_and_script_inject function in htdocs/main.inc.php in DolibarrERP/CRM 6.0.4 blocks some event attributes but neither onclick noronscroll, which allows XSS.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
